text: Mahmuda Khatun Siddiqua (16 December 1906 – 2 May 1977) was a Bangladeshi writer. She was awarded Ekushey Padak in 1977 by the Government of Bangladesh. == Early life == Siddiqua was born in Pabna in the then East Bengal and Assam to her parents Khan Bahadur Mohammad Sulaiman and Syeda Rahatunnesa Khatun. == Awards == * Bangla Academy Literary Award (1967) * Ekushey Padak (1977) == References == Category:1906 births Category:1977 deaths Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak Category:Recipients of Bangla Academy Award
title: Mahmuda Khatun Siddiqua
